I am an Electrical Engineering educator and practitioner interested in:

Power electronic converters

High-frequency magnetics

Analog & mixed-signal circuits

Engineering education

This site is not a polished blog, but a thinking/brain-dump notebook in public.

title: Engineering Notes & Experiments
text:
This site is a journal of learning and teaching in:

Electrical & Electronics Engineering

Power Electronics

Signals, Control, and Systems

Engineering intuition and design thinking

The content is written primarily for students, but also as a personal knowledge base.

“If you can explain it clearly, you understand it well.”
